notes.title: Welcome to NotePad
notes.content:
# Welcome to NotePad!

This is your new favorite note-taking application. Here's what you can do:

## Features
- Create and organize notes in folders
- Format your notes with Markdown
- Easily navigate between notes
- Create new folders to organize your work
- Dark mode support

## Getting Started
1. Click on "New Note" to create a new note
2. Use the "New Folder" button to create a new folder
3. Click on any note to view and edit its content
4. Save automatically as you type

Feel free to explore and organize your thoughts!
